git.commitMessage:
feat: Unified Debug Modal v3.1.0 + Join Game Fixes

Version 3.1.0 Release

Unified Debug Modal:
- Merged DebugInfo and GlobalDebugModal into one beautiful modal
- Collapsible sections for Server Health, Game Monitoring, Sentry Tests
- Real-time game monitoring with 5s auto-refresh
- Sentry integration testing (frontend + backend)
- Database cleanup tools
- All features in one gorgeous gradient UI

Join Game Improvements:
- Fixed join game from LobbyBrowser not working
- Fixed direct message migration SQL error (GROUP BY)
- Better logging for join flow debugging
- Fallback to join form if no playerName set

Generated with Claude Code
